runs.comm: good length outside off, Shahzad pats it to cover
full outside off and he goes after it, hits it off the inner half of the bat and doesn't carry to mid-on
free-hit early for Afghanistan. Outside off and cut straight to point, marginal call
full toss and Shahzad gives himself room and powers it to the right off mid-off, it races across the outfield
shorter length outside the off stump, powerfully cut to point
straighter this time, Shahzad flicks it to deep midwicket, just enough pace on it for them to get two
short outside off, Shahzad pulls it over mid-on with force, clears the infield and bounces away for the second boundary of the over
drifts on leg stump, Mangal walks across and flicks it short fine-leg
what a shot! Amjad bangs it in and Shahzad flat bats it to the vacant deep midwicket
full and drifting on leg stump and there is an appeal, goes down leg stump but Shahzad steps out for a run and is almost run out
short on middle and he goes for the pull, but doesn't time it, it lands well in front of deep square leg
good length outside off, Mangal can only block it to cover
shorter length and a little wider which is played away harmlessly to cover
goes fuller on leg stump but Shahzad skips down the track and hits it wide off long-off where a dive can't stop it
bangs in it short, but it goes down the leg side
drifts on his pads again at a fuller length, Shahzad just glances it to square leg this time
beats Mangal's defence, just a hint of away swing outside the off stump
fuller and straighter on middle, hit to short midwicket
advances this time and there is still a hint of away swing, and an edge is found off the heave which flies away to the third man boundary
good length ball on the fourth stump line which is defended off the back foot

another flat bat shot but it results in his dismissal this time, he bangs it in short outside the off stump and he tries to pull it off the front foot but the ball hurries on to him and he slaps the ball and it carries to third man.
fuller outside off and respectfully driven to cover
shorter on middle stump, hit off the back foot to midwicket
good tight lengths, outside off and at a good length, patted back to mid-off
back of a length again but a tad wider, and Stanikzai cuts to backward point
wicket-maiden for Amjad. good length outside off which is defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, Mangal stays on the backfoot and pulls elegantly but falls short of deep square leg
advances down the track and looks to belt it over mid-on, fails to connect however and is struck on his knee
shorter length this time and wide of off stump, awkwardly played to cover
drifts on the leg this time, he advances down the track and finds the inner half of the bat which beats short fine-leg and races away to the fine-leg boundary
he drifts down the leg this time, but the keeper comes front to stop him from skipping down the track, hits his pad and trolls to short fine-leg
on the pads again and flicked to deep square leg
drops it short outside the off stump, just a hint of turn, he stays back and pulls to deep midwicket
definite turn this time, pitches on a good length and beats the bat
fuller and driven to cover
short again, easily pulled to deep midwicket off the back foot
advances down the track and beats mid-on, fuller and he comes down and smothers the spin
fuller and outside off, blocked solidly
he again drifts on the pads, hits Mangal's pads and rolls away to square leg
full length outside off, driven to cover where they scamper for one
overpitched on middle, easily drilled down to long-on
bangs it in short which is pulled emphatically pulled but straight to deep square leg on the bounce
a hint of in swing from outside off, hit to cover
shorter length on middle, and glanced to fine leg with the angle
skips down the track and is belted on the ground to long-on
flatter and quicker, driven to cover again
slower this time outside off, glanced against the spin to deep midwicket
darted in this time on middle, just gets bat on that and rolls to short fine leg
slower again and spins again, patted back to the bowler
tossed up on leg stump but too full, smashed down to long-on
back of a length on middle, finds midwicket off his flick
slogged away over cow corner this time, he anticipated the line and length, stayed back and deposits it over midwicket
takes a step down, but gets an inside edge which rolls away to fine-leg
a bit of away swing, full and outside off, beats the bat
advances down the track and belts it again, smashes it over long-on, picked the line and length again
varies his length finally, goes shorter and wider of off, which is played away to cover
too full outside off and it is drilled on the square around the wicket which helps it bounce over point and race away
paddles it away this time, beautifully done, short on off and just enough pace on it which he uses well and gets it past short fine leg
the slower yorker works, outside off, Mangal cant get bat on that
slower ball again, stays on the front foot and sweeps it which falls just short of square leg
wide yorker outside off, can't find timing on that and is hit to cover
and the slower ball again, wide outside off. Gently cut away to point
slower on middle and is driven to long-on
tosses it up well but a bit too full, driven straight to cover
gets it this time. Tossed up again and a couple of steps forward and it is belted over midwicket for another six. Runs coming freely now
was that a drop? very tough catch for the keeper, shorter and the cut is attempted and a thick edge which is not accepted
short on middle, he stays on the back foot and pulls it well again, finds the fence once more at square leg
got him this time. Tries to slog it once more over deep midwicket, but it is straight and full and beats the heave.
wider outside off and back of a length, cut to third man
wide, full and fast, beats the attempted cut
overpitched just outside off this time, and it is smashed over cover, no chance for long-off
shorter and wider, finds point with the cut
overpitched again and outside off, takes the pace off that, heaved away on the ground to deep midwicket
goes short and wide outside off, cut away to the sweeper
darted in outside off, stays on the backfoot and pulls it in the air to long-on
a bit more flight this time, neatly glanced to square leg
84 kph, slower and it spins, blocked to cover
drifts on the leg, and flicks away to square leg
swept away to square leg off the fuller length
full yorker outside off again, Shenwari is late and it sneaks past his defence
slower ball this time, good variations, gently blocked back to the bowler
yorker once more, this time on middle, and it is driven to long-on
slower ball, but poor line, drifting down leg, Mangal gives himself a bit of room and it is easily swept past short fine-leg
hits the yorker again, dug out to short midwicket and they scamper for one
goes full and straight, Shenwari stays in his crease and hits it elegantly to midwicket, finds the gap too, great shot
tossed up outside off and it is belted down the ground, flat bats it too long-on for his fifty
shorter and wider, finds the gap in front of point
out this time, he goes straighter and gives it a bit more air, and he lofts it down the ground but straight to long-off. Another big wicket for Hong Kong
darts it in outside off, hits it to cover where there is some good fielding
flatter again, driven to long-on
slower outside off with a bit of air, driven to long-on for another single
aims for the yorker agin but ends up with a very full delivery, Najibullah still can't get much bat on it, hit back to the bowler
full on middle, flicked away to midwicket
full on middle again, he gets under it and lofts it on the bounce to long-on, big boundaries here
a bit too full again, can't get under it this time, drives to long-on
misses the yorker, ends up with an enticing full toss, but can just hit it down to long-on, missed opportunity
another attempted yorker which ends up as a full toss outside off, scythed away to the sweeper
good yorker outside off, Najibullah can't do much with it, digs it out to point
another excellent yorker outside off, not much the batsmen can do, again just dug out to cover

third time unlucky, ends up with a full ball on middle, which is smashed in the air to midwicket but a great catch by Kinchit on the midwicket boundary as he runs round from square leg and gets both hands on it. Najibullah thought he had enough on that
overpitched outside off, misses the yorker again, drilled down off the back foot which races faway or four
another high full toss, but he doesn't time the heave, finds deep midwicket
good length outside off which is driven elegantly but straight to cover
and he is greeted with a reverse sweep, slower ball on off stump, Shenwari gets into position early and gets enough bat on that
misses his line as he drifts down the leg side
another wicket for Hong Kong, shorter length on off stump, he attempts to pull it over midwicket but doesnt get enough bat on it nor does he time it well, finds long-on well inside the boundary
straight and full, Nabi can only hit it down to long-on for one
good yorker outside off, gently hit to mid-on, where they scamper for a brace
misses the yorker this time and fires a full toss down leg
yorker again on off stump, drilled down to long-on
hits the yorker well again, Nabi just gets a bit of an inside edge on it which is well kept, saved four
too full and a bit too wide, scythed away awkwardly as he loses his balance, just over backward point
great bowling by Hong Kong, hitting their yorkers consistently, digs it out and rolls away to midwicket and they run another brace, good running
low full toss outside off - the next best ball after the yorker, hit away to midwicket
misses his yorker, ends up with a inviting length just outside off, Nabi picks it and belts it over long-on
overpitched outside off, Nabi can't get under that, but drills it down to long-on
attempts an exotic lap sweep, connects well off the full ball but finds short fine-leg as he falls over
back of the hand slower ball, dips on Nabi but he hits the full toss easily down to long-on
poor ball, full outside off, Shafiqullah gets under it and smashes it over long-off, clears the boundary by a good 10 metres
low full toss, drilled down to long-on again
back of a hand slower ball again, ends up with a shorter length on middle and at no pace, Nabi wait for it and finds the square leg boundary
great catch again, full on middle, Nabi just about gets under it and swats it to long-on where Chapman runs around and takes an excellent diving catch

good yorker to end the innings, all he can do is keep it out as it rolls back to the bowler, and the batsman contemplate a suicidal run before Shafiqullah is sent back. Haseeb hits the stumps to find the batsman well short
